snippet: In his first public comments since returning from Washington, President Hamid Karzai of Afghanistan also said the handover of detainees held by American forces would be sped up.
abstract: Afghan Pres Hamid Karzai, in his first public announcement since returning from Washington, says that United States will give Afghanistan its own fleet of aerial surveillance drones and will speed up handover of detainees held by American forces.
lead_paragraph: In his first public comments since returning from Washington, President Hamid Karzai of Afghanistan also said the handover of detainees held by American forces would be sped up.

headline.seo: Hamid Karzai Says U.S. Will Give Spy Drones to Afghanistan
headline.main: U.S. to Give Spy Drones to Afghans, Karzai Says
headline.print_headline: U.S. to Give Spy Drones To Afghans, Karzai Says
